column4: Any ideas on my problem with apt-get?  W: Not using locking for read only lock file /var/lib/dpkg/lock ;; E: Unable to write to /var/cache/apt/ ;; E: The package lists or statuf ile could not be parsed or opened.

Any ideas on my problem with apt-get?  W: Not using locking for read only lock file /var/lib/dpkg/lock ;; E: Unable to write to /var/cache/apt/ ;; E: The package lists or statuf ile could not be parsed or opened.
